{"id":500978211,"lang":"java","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1622486530,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/500978211/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    int[] dp;\n    public int numSquares(int n) {\n        dp = new int[n + 1];\n        Arrays.fill(dp, Integer.MAX_VALUE);\n        // bottom case\n        dp[0] = 0;\n        return solve(n);\n    }\n    \n    private int solve(int n) {\n        if (n <= 3) return n;\n        int ans = n;\n        for (int i = 1; i * i <= n; i++) {\n            int nextInt = n - (i * i);\n            if (dp[nextInt] != Integer.MAX_VALUE)\n                ans = Math.min(ans, 1 + dp[nextInt]);\n            else\n                ans = Math.min(ans, 1 + solve(nextInt));\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
